name: Breakdown (itch) (OneDollarProductions)
description:
In Breakdown you control a lowly ensign aboard a stranded space ship and are tasked with getting it moving again.

Features a comedic story, classic point-and-click adventuring and lots of animation and sound.

Breakdown is the third point-and-click adventure game I made with Chris Jones' Adventure Game Studio, and was created in less than a month for the "Space Derelict" themed April 2009 Monthly Adventure Game Studio (MAGS) competition on the Adventure Game Studio forums.

Controls:
Left mouse - walk/use
Right mouse - examine

The game runs natively on Windows but also works in ScummVM versions 2.5+ so you should be able to use that to play on Mac, Linux etc.
